::FZ/Perndabot::

FZ watches the stasis pod crash near the Iron Fist, the defences 
automatically targeting it but not firing. He turns to Perndabot.

"Can you go and see about this new bot?" he asks Perndabot, the other 
nodding.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Perndabot stands up and walks out of the bridge of the Iron Fist. 
Several seconds later, he emerges from the ship and walks to the edge 
of the shore, looking out at the new female.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "FIRE FOX" <firefox_y2k@h...> wrote:
> From deep within space flew a stasis pod. It crashed through stray 
rocks and 
> pecies of metal as it flew past the previous site of the Ark battle 
and hit 
> the Earth's atmosphere at a fantastic speed. It's rate didn't slow, 
but in 
> fact increased until it was nothing more than a burning blur in the 
sky. The 
> pod would have quickly overheated if it had not broken through the 
> atmosphere and foud it's way to a great body of water. It crashed 
and sank 
> nearly to the bottom before its flotation device activated and it 
began to 
> resurface.
> 
> The pod bobbed on the surface of the rippling water, the DNA scan 
active but 
> finding nothing suitable. Then a small creature cried out as it 
dove toward 
> the pod. THe blue bird quickly realized that the new addition to 
its habitat 
> was not eadible, and pulled up as it flew out of site. That was 
enough, 
> however, to provide the 'bot within the pod a form.
> 
> The pod opened with a lou HISS as the bot within sat up and 
stretched. She 
> took a moment to realize where she was before turning to gaze at 
the large 
> base beside her.(The Iron Fist)She then turned her attention to her 
> reflection in the  now still water:
> 
> "Now this, I can live with."
> 
> Swyft smiled as she continued to admire herself in the glassy water.
>
